run.step: Step01. Create pool ledger

Step21. Verify that TrustAnchor cannot create another TrustAnchor

run.message:
Cannot remove Trustee1's role
Cannot remove Steward1's role
Cannot remove Trust_Anchor1's role
Bug: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/IS-430

run.step: Step23. Verify that removed Trustee1 cannot create Trustee or Steward
run.message:
Removed Trustee can create Trustee (should fail) 
Removed Trustee can create Steward(should fail) 
Bug: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/IS-430

run.step: Step24. Verify that removed Steward1 cannot create TrustAnchor
run.message:
Steward1 can create a TrustAnchor (should fail)
Bug: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/IS-430

run.step: Step25. Using default Trustee to create Trustee1
Step26. Using Trustee1 to add Steward1
Step27. Verify that Steward1 cannot add back a TrustAnchor removed by TrustTee
Step28. Verify that Steward cannot remove a Trustee
Step29. Verify that Trustee can add new Steward
30. Verify that Steward cannot remove another Steward
Step31. Verify Steward can add a TrustAnchor
